'e30613'], 'BHA': ['#0057B8', '#0057B8'], 'BUR': ['#6C1D45', '#6C1D45'], 'CHE': ['#034694', '#034694'], 'CRY': ['#1B458F', '#C4122E'], 'EVE': ['#003399', '#003399'], 'LEE': ['white', '#FFCD00'], ['#D71920', 'white'], 'TOT': ['white', '#132257'], 'WAT': ['#FBEE23', '#11210C'], 'WHU': ['#7A263A', '#1BB1E7'], 'WOL': ['#FDB913', '#231F20'], } //set theme to purple when rendering the players page res.json()) .then(data => { setData(data); setData2(data); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }); }, []); return (
{ let searchWord = document.getElementById('search-bar').value; let newData = data2.filter(function(player) { return player.full_name.includes(searchWord) }) setData(newData) }}>
{data.map((player) => { const { id, full_name, web_name, position, team, short_name, price, total_points, minutes, points_per_minute, points_per_price, points_per_game, points_per_price_per_minute, points_per_price_per_game, status, takes_corners, takes_freekicks, takes_penalties, form, ict_index } = player; return ( ) })}
) } /* Sets the theme of the page * @param: primeColor - backgroundcolor of header and counter * @param: secondaryColor - backgroundcolor of menu */ function setTheme(primeColor, secondaryColor) { const header = document.getElementById('header'); header.style.backgroundColor = primeColor; const counter = document.getElementById('counter'); counter.style.backgroundColor = primeColor; const menu = document.getElementById('menu'); menu.style.backgroundColor = secondaryColor; } export default Players;
